scripts.build-site: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=site
scripts.build-app: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=app
scripts.build-carbonmark: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=carbonmark
scripts.build-carbonmark-api: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=carbonmark-api
scripts.build-carbon: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=carbon
scripts.remove-dist: cd carbonmark-api && rm -rf dist && npm run build
scripts.dev-carbonmark-api: npm run remove-dist && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm:dev-lib" "npm run dev -w=carbonmark-api"
scripts.extract-strings: npm run -w site lingui:extract && npm run -w app lingui:extract && npm run -w carbonmark lingui:extract && npm run -w carbon lingui:extract
scripts.compile-strings: npm run extract-strings && npm run -w site lingui:compile && npm run -w app lingui:compile && npm run -w carbonmark lingui:compile && npm run -w carbon lingui:compile
scripts.extract-strings:dev: npm run -w site lingui:extract:dev && npm run -w app lingui:extract:dev && npm run -w carbonmark lingui:extract:dev && npm run -w carbon lingui:extract:dev
scripts.export-app: npm run build-lib && IS_STATIC_EXPORT=true npm run build-app && IS_STATIC_EXPORT=true npm run export -w=app
